name: ITP approved for use by: Romualdo Magpantay
Acceptance Criteria - Samples, records and certificates shall be provided to the Nominated Authority (NA) at least 10 working days prior to bulk delivery.
Following information shall be provided to the NA:
○ Attach: Records and Certs into Hold Point inTeamBinder and write the Reference No.
Frequency - Prior to Commencement of works
Reference - VicRoads Spec: Cl.720.04, Table 720.042 IFC Drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Site won topsoil to be tested to establish what soil amendments and macro and micro nutreints are required to be added to the top soil if required by planting subcontractor.
○ Where imported topsoil is used, the topsoil must conform to the properties specified in Table 720.042 and align with IFC Drawings.
○ Attach: Material Conformance Docs / Test Reports as Material Approval onto TeamBinder and write the Reference No.
Method - Verify, Doc. Review if applicable
Frequency - Prior to Commencement of works
Reference - VicRoads Spec: Cl.720.04, Table 720.044, AS4454 IFC Drawings
Acceptance Criteria - Site mulch available from the chipping of on-site indigenous or non-weed vegetation shall be used where possible, otherwise approved mulch stated on IFC drawings.
○ All wood mulch to be spread in accordance to AS 4454 and conform to required depth stated in IFC drawings .
○ Imported Wood Mulch shall comply with Table 720.044.
○ Attach: Material Conformance Docs / Test Reports as Material Approvasl onto TeamBinder and write the Reference No.
Method - Verify, Doc. Review if applicable
Frequency - Prior to Commencement of works
Acceptance Criteria - All Plants have been inspected and comply with Sec 720.041
Acceptance Criteria - Grass seed shall comply with Table 720.045
○ Attach: Material Conformance Docs / Test Reports as Material Approvasl onto TeamBinder and write the Reference No.
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
— Using the correct and complete set of IFC drawings
— All drawings are the latest revision
Frequency - Prior to Commencement of works
Acceptance Criteria - Subcontractor ITP to be reviewed and approved by MRPA.
Acceptance Criteria - Refer to Subcontractor ITP
Acceptance Criteria - Rip Subsoil to min 250mm at 500mm spacing
○ Do not proceed until the NA inspects and acknowledges requirements for ripping have been met.
Verifying Documents - Sign ITP, Attach Lot Map/Marked Up Area Inspected
Acceptance Criteria - Topsoil to be installed at 150mm depth with no air pockets, weeds, rocks, and other debris. Finish surface should be smooth and uniform
Reference - IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec: Cl. 720.08(a)
Acceptance Criteria - Mulch to be installed at 100mm and to finish 50mm below pavement.
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Reference - IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec: Cl. 720.04(i)
Acceptance Criteria - Refer to Subcontractor ITP
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Reference - IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec: Table 720.071
Acceptance Criteria - Pre-slit Jute Matt installed as per specification
○ Lay Matting into a trench of min 150mm wide and depth, pin and backfill
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Reference - IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec: Table 720.041
Acceptance Criteria - Plants to be removed from Pot and Roots Tickled
○ Ensure Mulch does not overly cover stem of plant
○ Ensure plants to be watered within the same day
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Reference - IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec: Table 720.041
Acceptance Criteria - Tubestock: 10gms (approx. 1 teaspoon) of fertiliser been added to base of plant
○ 15-30cm Pots: 40gms (approx. 4 teaspoons) of fertiliser been added to base of plant
○ 45L Trees: 80gms (approx. 8 teaspoons) of fertiliser been added to top of root ball
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Reference - IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec: Table 720.041
— Hole to be 100mm deeper and 600mm wider than pot size
— Three 50mm x 50mm x 2400mm Hardwood Stakes driven min 600mm into ground outside rootball
— Tree Pit Inspected and Minimum 3 times the root ball width
— Three 50mm x 50mm x 2400mm Hardwood Stakes driven min 600mm into ground outside rootball
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Acceptance Criteria - 75mm depth topsoil & 100mm min in swales consolidated as approved
Verifying Documents - Subcontractor ITP, Attach Delivery Dockets
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that any NCRs pertaining to the lot/element/Work Area that this ITP covers, have been closed
Frequency - Once, prior to closure of this lot/element/work area

On behalf of Metropolitan Roads Program Alliance, it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the item of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
